ModMetaData.name: MoreCarpets
ModMetaData.author: GreatWall
ModMetaData.description:
<size=24>MoreCarpets for your colonies.</size>
Adds 3 new advanced carpets locked behind their own research:
<size=18>Devilstrand carpet</size> Costs 7x Devilstrand +6 Beauty Very fire resistant Increased movement speed
<size=18>Hyperweave carpet</size> Costs 8x Hyperweave +6 Beauty Sterile Fire resistant Increased movement speed
<size=18>Synthread carpet</size> Costs 7x Synthread +6 Beauty Fire resistant Increased movement speed
<size=18>Orange comfy carpet</size> Costs 35x Cloth + 5x Devilstrand +6 Beauty Slightly flame resistant Increased movement speed
<size=18>Green comfy carpet</size> Costs 35x Cloth + 5x Devilstrand +6 Beauty Slightly flame resistant Increased movement speed
<size=18>Black comfy carpet</size> Costs 35x Cloth + 5x Devilstrand +6 Beauty Slightly flame resistant Increased movement speed
